resources.string: An error occured while executing the Brainfuck code forcing the execution to stop immediately
There exist one or many loops which are missing either a beginning or an end

string-array.name: examples_list
string-array.item: Convert text to BF code and display

resources.string: In this example, cell numbers are annotated as C0 for cell #0 for example. The enumeration of the cells starts by 0.
Increments the data pointer (to point to the next cell to the right)
Decrements the data pointer (to point to the next cell to the left)
Increments (increase by one) the byte at the data pointer
Decrements (decrease by one) the byte at the data pointer
Outputs the byte at the data pointer
Accepts one byte of input, storing its value in the byte at the data pointer
If the byte at the data pointer is zero, then instead of moving the instruction pointer forward to the next command, jump it forward to the command after the matching ] command
If the byte at the data pointer is nonzero, then instead of moving the instruction pointer forward to the next command, jump it back to the command after the matching [ command
This program will simply redirect the input to the output and write every character on the tape until the end of the given input
An infinite loop has been detected forcing the execution to be stopped
